text: (nabiyē! dænaṭa æti obagē bhāryayāvangen) pasu (oba vivāha kara gænīmaṭa venat) kisima kāntāvak obaṭa anumata keneku nova. tavada ovungē alaṁkāraya obava ākarṣaṇaya kaḷā vuvada, (obagē) bhāryayāvangen kisivekut paha kara, ē venuvaṭa æyava gænīmada, (obaṭa anumata næta). obagē dakuṇat himi kara gat kāntāvan hæra. (ovun obaṭa anumata ayayi!) allāh siyalla avadhānaya kara balanneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
